original_text: ‘God will curse any man who has sex with his wife's mother.’ Then all the people will say, ‘Yes, we agree!’
korean_text: 장모와 동침하는 자는 저주를 받을 것이라 할 것이요 모든 백성은 아멘 할지니라

sentences.original_text: who has sex with his wife's mother.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내의 어머니와 성관계를 가진 자를.'

sentences.original_text: Then all the people will say,
